issues.title: Voting Rights Protection
issues.description: Strong advocate for expanding voting access, opposing voter suppression laws, and supporting federal voting rights legislation

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports aggressive climate change policies, including Green New Deal framework and carbon reduction targets

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports Medicare for All, expanded public healthcare options, and reducing pharmaceutical drug prices

issues.title: Gun Control
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive gun safety legislation, universal background checks, and assault weapons ban

issues.title: LGBTQ+ Rights
issues.description: Strong supporter of comprehensive anti-discrimination protections, marriage equality, and transgender rights

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship, and opposing restrictive border policies

issues.title: Economic Equity
issues.description: Advocates for progressive taxation, increased minimum wage, and stronger worker protections
